data.name: BANSHEE_EV1_D
data.value: With a chance (25%) emits a unique sound into a directed microphone.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV2_D
data.value: Has an increased chance of a singing ghost event.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV3_D
data.value: The target will lose 15% sanity if they touch the ghost during a singing ghost event (the event must be directed at the target, not another player).

data.name: BANSHEE_EV4
data.value: Observes the sanity of the target

data.name: BANSHEE_EV4_D
data.value: The Banshee's hunt is influenced only by the target's percentage sanity, not the team's overall sanity.

data.name: BANSHEE_EV5_D
data.value: Only pursue the selected target during the hunt. (If the target is outside the location, the Banshee will behave like a regular ghost).

data.name: DEMON_EV1_D
data.value: If you light sage near a Demon, it cannot begin hunting for the next 60 seconds.

data.name: DEMON_EV2_D
data.value: The minimum interval between attacks is 20 seconds (25 seconds for other ghosts).

data.name: DEMON_EV3_D
data.value: The range of the Crucifix is increased by 50% (4.5m, 6m, and 7.5m respectively).

data.name: JINN_EV1
data.value: Does not turn off the breaker

data.name: JINN_EV1_D
data.value: Never turns off the breaker. (Do not confuse with overload caused by a large number of lights turned on)

data.name: JINN_EV2
data.value: Lowers sanity within 3 meters of itself when the breaker is on.

data.name: JINN_EV2_D
data.value: Burns 25% of sanity for all players within 3 meters of itself if the breaker is on; also, an EMF reading appears on the breaker.

data.name: MARE_EV1_D
data.value: The Mare never turns on lights but instead has an increased chance to turn them off.

data.name: MARE_EV2_D
data.value: The Mare has an increased chance of a ghost event involving smashing light bulbs.

data.name: MARE_EV3_D
data.value: It has an increased chance of wandering from a lit room into a dark one

data.name: MARE_EV4_D
data.value: Instantly turns off the lights (switch) that the player has just turned on (no more than once every 10 seconds)

data.name: MARE_EV5
data.value: Turns off the lights during a ghost event

data.name: MARE_EV5_D
data.value: Can turn off the lights during a paranormal event, not just before its onset.

data.name: PHANTOM_EV1_D
data.value: If you photograph it during a ghost event (or on the summoning circle, music box), it will disappear immediately after the flash, the electronics will stop malfunctioning, and the heartbeat will stop, but the event will continue. There will be no interference in the photo and no ghost. (If you photograph it during an attack, there will also be no interference and no ghost in the photo).

data.name: PHANTOM_EV2_D
data.value: Approach a random player, and in the place where it arrives, you will get an EMF reading. The attack will not begin until it reaches its destination.

data.name: PHANTOM_EV3
data.value: Lowers sanity within 10 meters of itself.

data.name: PHANTOM_EV3_D
data.value: Being within 10 meters of the Phantom decreases the player's sanity at a rate of 0.4-0.5% per second.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV1_D
data.value: Can throw objects with greater force than other ghosts.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV2_D
data.value: During hunts, it has a 100% chance to throw an object every 0.5 seconds.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV3
data.value: Decreases sanity due to throwing objects.

data.name: POLTERGEIST_EV3_D
data.value: For each object thrown by the poltergeist, 2% of sanity is deducted from those who witnessed the throw.

data.name: REVENANT_EV1
data.value: Slower when not in sight of a player

data.name: REVENANT_EV1_D
data.value: The Revenant moves at a speed of 1 m/s when it cannot see or hear players and does not sense their electronics.

data.name: SHADOW_EV1
data.value: Does not interact when players are present

data.name: SHADOW_EV1_D
data.value: If at least one player is in the room with the Shade, it ceases to interact with the environment (except for candles).

data.name: SHADOW_EV2
data.value: Does not hunt when players are present.

data.name: SHADOW_EV2_D
data.value: The Shade cannot initiate an attack in a room with a player.

data.name: SHADOW_EV3_D
data.value: During ghost events, the Shade is more likely to appear in its shadow form.

data.name: SHADOW_EV4_D
data.value: High chance of a ghost event taking the form of a mist.

data.name: SHADOW_EV5
data.value: Shadow form when using cursed items

data.name: SHADOW_EV5_D
data.value: The Shade is the only ghost that, when using the Ouija board or spirit box, can appear in its shadow form.

data.name: SHADOW_EV6
data.value: Does not trigger a ghost event at 100% sanity

data.name: SHADOW_EV6_D
data.value: With each percentage of total sanity lost, the Shade increases its chance of manifesting a paranormal event by 2%.

data.name: PARABOLIC_MIC_SCREAM_DSCR
data.value: A player can hear the unique scream through Parabolic Microphone

data.name: SALT_FOOTPRINTS_DSCR
data.value: Wraith never leaves footprints on salt

data.name: BANSHEE_EV6_D
data.value: Outside of the hunt, the Banshee can go to its target, and then return to the room until the Banshee reaches its destination and the hunt begins. (P.S. The Banshee cannot reach its target if it is on another floor)
